content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. The agent repeatedly attempted to establish a Lab—to be used for supplying Automation Science Packs for research—at position (0.5, 2.5). Despite several recovery updates and reattempts (including fallback approaches for lab detection and crafting), the Lab was never successfully created or placed.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage Errors
  - When calling get_entities, avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and passing positional arguments if none are accepted. Verify the function’s signature before invocation.
  
• Lab Placement and Inventory Errors
  - Placement failures (e.g., “No lab in inventory”) indicate that the lab item was not available when attempting to place it. Confirm inventory contents ahead of placement operations.
  
• Lab Crafting and Ingredient Shortages
  - Repeated crafting failures—including errors from iterating over a NoneType and missing sub-ingredients (iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, copper-cable, and copper-plate)—suggest that the intermediary production chains are not sufficiently established. Ensure that all prerequisites for lab crafting are available and that retrieval functions return valid iterables before filtering.
